features.title: Why Choose Garda Racing?
features.subtitle: We provide the complete yacht racing experience with professional guidance, premium equipment, and memories that last a lifetime.

item1.description: Authentic yacht regatta with team dynamics, medals, and true competition.

item2.title: Professional Skipper

item5.title: Accessible & Premium
item5.description: A top-level regatta experience open to everyone ‚Äî no experience needed.

experience.title: Your Perfect Day on Lake Garda

step1.title: Morning Briefing
step1.description: Meet your professional skipper and learn the basics of yacht racing in a relaxed, friendly environment.

step2.title: Racing Experience
step2.description: Participate in authentic yacht races with other boats, experiencing the thrill of competition on beautiful Lake Garda.

step3.title: Medal Ceremony
step3.description: Celebrate your achievement with an official medal ceremony and receive your personalized racing certificate.

testimonials.title: What Our Sailors Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who've experienced the magic of Lake Garda racing

location.title: Prime Location in Riva del Garda

item1.title: Easy Access from Munich
item1.description: Just 4 hours drive from Munich, making it perfect for weekend getaways and corporate events.

item2.title: World-Class Sailing Conditions
item2.description: Lake Garda offers consistent winds and stunning Alpine scenery, making it Europe's premier sailing destination.

item3.title: Daily Departures
item3.description: Multiple time slots available daily from March to October, with flexible booking options.

partners.title: Our Trusted Partners
partners.subtitle: We work with the world's leading yacht and marine equipment manufacturers to provide you with the best possible sailing experience.
partners.cta_text: Interested in partnering with us? We're always looking for quality brands that share our passion for sailing.

final_cta.title: Ready for Your Sailing Adventure?
final_cta.subtitle: Join us for an unforgettable day of yacht racing on Lake Garda. No experience necessary - just bring your sense of adventure!

booking.title: Book Your Regatta Experience
booking.subtitle: Choose a date and time for an unforgettable yacht racing experience on Lake Garda

calendar.no_slots_description: There are no available time slots for this date. Please select another date.

payment.secure_description: Your payment is secured by Stripe's industry-leading encryption. We never store your credit card information.
payment.sign_in_description: You need to be signed in to complete your booking. This helps us keep track of your bookings and provide better service.

availability.june_weekends: During June, regattas are available only on weekends (Saturday & Sunday). Weekdays are fully booked for private events.
availability.july_weekends: During July, regattas are available only on weekends (Saturday & Sunday). Weekdays are fully booked for private events.
availability.all_dates: All dates are available for booking during {{month}}. Choose any day that works for you!

events.title: The Complete Racing Experience
events.subtitle: From beginner to champion in one day. Experience authentic yacht racing on Lake Garda with professional instruction, competitive races, and official recognition of your achievement.
events.beginner_to_champion: From beginner to champion in one day. Experience authentic yacht racing on Lake Garda with professional instruction, competitive races, and official recognition of your achievement.

overview.professional_instruction_desc: Learn from certified sailing professionals with years of racing experience on Lake Garda.
overview.authentic_racing_desc: Participate in real yacht races with official timing, scoring, and medal ceremonies.
overview.professional_documentation_desc: High-quality photos and videos of your experience, delivered within 24 hours.
overview.j70_yachts: Races held on J/70 class professional sailing yachts
overview.licensed_skipper: Each boat includes a licensed skipper and full crew
overview.official_races: 3‚Äì5 official races per day, scored under sailing sport rules
overview.judging_team: Supervised by a qualified judging team and technical support boats
overview.medal_ceremony_certificates: Medal ceremony and certificates for top crews

schedule.welcome_registration_desc: Meet your skipper and fellow sailors
schedule.safety_briefing_desc: Essential safety procedures and equipment overview

equipment.safety_description: All safety equipment meets international standards. Our boats are regularly inspected and maintained to the highest standards. Every participant receives a comprehensive safety briefing before departure.
equipment.premium_yachts_desc: We use modern J-70/J-80 high-performance yachts. These boats are specifically chosen for their racing capabilities while maintaining comfort and safety for our participants.
equipment.first_aid: First aid kit and emergency equipment

faq.sailing_experience_answer: No sailing experience is required! Our professional skippers will teach you everything you need to know. We welcome complete beginners and experienced sailors alike.
faq.what_to_bring_answer: Bring comfortable clothes, sunscreen, a hat, and a change of clothes. We provide all sailing equipment, safety gear.
faq.bad_weather: What if the weather is bad?
faq.bad_weather_answer: Safety is our priority. If conditions are unsafe, we'll reschedule your experience at no extra cost. Light rain doesn't stop us - it's part of the adventure!
faq.people_per_boat_answer: Each yacht accommodates 4-5 participants plus the professional skipper. This ensures personalized attention.
faq.bring_camera_answer: Absolutely! We also provide professional photography services. You'll receive high-quality photos and videos of your racing experience within 24 hours.

services.title: Corporate Services
services.subtitle: Create unforgettable corporate events on Lake Garda. Professionally organized regattas to strengthen team spirit.
